Catalano.Fuzzy

Class Clause

  • java.lang.Object
    • Catalano.Fuzzy.Clause

  • public class Clause
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a fuzzy clause, a linguistic expression of the type "Variable IS Value".

    • Constructor Summary
